歡迎各位fm bb，有咩關於space嘅問題可以喺道問
year 2同老鬼都可以幫手答

Frequently Asked Questions: 

1.點DEFER學費? 
打封英文解釋信 
加埋offer letter+經濟困難證明文件+留位費收據既copy 
交份copy去space院校就得 
帶埋所有文件正本比人check 
之後返去等通知 
詳情可以打去space問 
by梵高的星夜 

2.咩係天書? 
係KEC十樓，有每年不同科升大學的數據，包括公開試成績，GPA，IELTS，interview問題 

3. SPACE最伏係邊幾科? 
沒有廢科，只有廢人 

4. 常用連結
https://learner.hkuspace.hku.hk/

交學費、add drop swap科、睇timetable、apply locker、download notes、交功課、reference letter、圖書館book 房、睇/買transcript、 withdraw from study全部經portal入到

港大附屬學院成績驕人 是你首選

1/3升讀三兩大
2/3升讀八大UGC



同學連SEM BREAK都不忘回校，手執書卷努力溫習，反映學術氣氛濃厚


關於killer......
唔少人都話space有killer，永遠榮譽太空人港英狗（戇鳩仔）咁講：


不過我自己咁睇，我覺得好多因素影響grade嘅，每個lecturer點都要派啲A+派啲B-，如果你嗰班多勁人，有對比之下你自然睇落差啲；相反你嗰班本身廢廢哋，而你水平又稍為高啲啲，assignment同present做得好啲，個A/A+自然袋袋平安。加埋出grade前每個lecturer比嘅grade都會微調，assignment A+final grade拉落A A-拉上A+都有，9分努力1分運氣，做好自己結果唔會太差嘅，唔對路咪add drop轉班囉。

唔好聽到人話某個lecturer教得好就狗衝（尤其中英文），入到去比成班英文啪啪聲嘅學霸堂堂屌打，出gdp嘅時候就欲哭無淚。某啲傳說中嘅killer無人reg，結果一個學霸都無，呢個就係你大顯身手嘅時候，多啲答問題問問題唔好怕醜，啲廢人一定笑鳩你多嘢講，你要記住平時分就係咁樣來，出gdp嗰陣你揸隻A佢揸隻B，睇下邊個笑到最後。同埋千祈唔好遲到同埋走堂，平時分執豆咁執，蘇州過後無艇搭，無咗呢10%話知你全部assignment A+ final grade都唔會上到A+。機會只係劉備勤力嘅人，做人做狗自己決定

*雖然最頂寫住「沒有廢科，只有廢人」，只係祖訓來架咋，EE(energy & environment)、AA(Art appreciation)、IPhil(Introduction to philosophy)呢三科係大伏，揀咗嘅自己睇路，drop科保平安

Dear students,

In view of the latest development of the Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) outbreak, face-to-face classroom teaching at the College will be suspended after the Chinese New Year holidays and will resume on Monday, February 17, 2020. Details of the teaching and learning arrangements will be announced in due course.

Non-local students who are in Hong Kong are advised to stay in Hong Kong during the period when classes are suspended. Those who are not in Hong Kong at present should consider not returning to Hong Kong at this point in time.

The College has strengthened preventive measures as far as practicable. Please stay vigilant and take proper precautions related to personal hygiene and prevention of transmission or infection. For the latest updates and prevention measures, please refer to the following websites for more information:

1. Severe Respiratory Disease associated with a Novel Infectious Agent
2. HKU's Public Health, Pandemic and Epidemic Diseases Preparedness and Response website

Our teachers will use SOUL and emails to distribute course materials and assignments to ensure student learning not be disrupted. Please check regularly the latest information posted by the College on the Leaner Portal and the SOUL platforms.

Meanwhile, the campus will remain open, and offices will continue to operate as far as practicable.

This is a very dangerous coronavirus! Let us work together to overcome this potential epidemic!

Regards,
Professor Chan Lung Sang
College Principal
HKU SPACE Community College

Dear students,

Classroom/Face-to face teaching will be suspended from Feb 3 to Feb 29. We will conduct online teaching and learning throughout the coming four weeks.

Please noted that we will conduct online teaching and learning starting from the week of Feb 3:

1) The lecture notes and reading materials will be uploaded to SOUL platform. You are encouraged to spend time on reading the materials.

2) The teaching powerpoint with audio recordings by lecturer will be conducted as soon as possible. This is the core part of the online teaching. You are highly encouraged to listen the recordings in details.

3) You can use the messenger of SOUL and email (tangchingkin@gmail.com) to contact me for any consultations or questions.

4) The assessment mentioned will be rearranged. The details will be announced later.

5) Please keep check the announcements of SOUL so that you can get the latest arrangement of the course during the period of class suspension.

Wish you all good health.

Regards,
TANG Ching Kin

pinned.msg:
Dear students,

In view of the latest development of the Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) outbreak, face-to-face classroom teaching at the College will be suspended after the Chinese New Year holidays and will resume on Monday, February 17, 2020. Details of the teaching and learning arrangements will be announced in due course.

Non-local students who are in Hong Kong are advised to stay in Hong Kong during the period when classes are suspended. Those who are not in Hong Kong at present should consider not returning to Hong Kong at this point in time.

The College has strengthened preventive measures as far as practicable. Please stay vigilant and take proper precautions related to personal hygiene and prevention of transmission or infection. For the latest updates and prevention measures, please refer to the following websites for more information:

1. Severe Respiratory Disease associated with a Novel Infectious Agent
2. HKU's Public Health, Pandemic and Epidemic Diseases Preparedness and Response website

Our teachers will use SOUL and emails to distribute course materials and assignments to ensure student learning not be disrupted. Please check regularly the latest information posted by the College on the Leaner Portal and the SOUL platforms.

Meanwhile, the campus will remain open, and offices will continue to operate as far as practicable.

This is a very dangerous coronavirus! Let us work together to overcome this potential epidemic!

Regards,
Professor Chan Lung Sang
College Principal
HKU SPACE Community College
